alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 30 at 3:30PM HST until January 31 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI... .A declining northwest (310 degrees) swell combined with wind waves from fresh to strong northeasterly winds will maintain rough elevated surf along north and east facing shores of Kauai through most of the night. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 10 to 15 feet along north facing shores of Kauai and surf of 7 to 10 feet along east facing shores of Kauai. * WHERE...North and east facing shores of Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
